title: CollapseQParser doesn't expose params to reference from max & min functions
description: The "collapse" (CollapseQParserPlugin) has a max and min local-param to collapse by the min or max value of the provided function query.  Unfortunately, when the FunctionQParser is invoked, the local-params of the CollapseQParser invocation nor the params of the request are passed through.  In some circumstances, it might even make query() impractical or impossible.
